n0:createSxmlObject.n0:source: <VIEW xmlns="http://xmlns.oracle.com/ku" version="1.0"> <SCHEMA>DEV</SCHEMA> <NAME>EMP_DETAILS_VIEW</NAME> <DEFAULT_COLLATION>USING_NLS_COMP</DEFAULT_COLLATION> <COL_LIST> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>COUNTRY_NAME</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>REGION_NAME</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> </COL_LIST> <SUBQUERY>select c.country_name, r.region_name from countries c join regions r on c.region_id = r.region_id</SUBQUERY> </VIEW>
